definition: a class of nouns or pronouns or adjectives in Indo-European languages having the same (or very similar) inflectional forms
details:
noun
- a class of nouns or pronouns or adjectives in Indo-European languages having the same (or very similar) inflectional forms
= example: a class of nouns or pronouns or adjectives in Indo-European languages having the same (or very similar) inflectional forms
- a downward slope or bend
= synonyms: fall
- process of changing to an inferior state
= synonyms: worsening
- the inflection of nouns and pronouns and adjectives in Indo-European languages
